description:
As his men continue to fall left and right, Yoshinari continues to fight valiantly with his spear. Despite getting stabbed through the stomach with Yamazaki`s spear, he tells them about Nobunaga`s vision of a new world. Meanwhile, Chidori manages to return to Nobunaga`s main camp and hears that there is a message from Usayama Castle...
Source: crunchyroll
